verses.verse: Now the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> in the <S%H6160>plains<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> by the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> opposite <S%H3405>Jericho,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H6680>"Command<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> that they <S%H5414>give<s%> to the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> from the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of their <S%H272>possession,<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> to <S%H3427>live<s%> in; and you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> to the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> the <S%H5892>cities.<s%>

"And the <S%H5892>cities<s%> shall be <S%H1992>theirs<s%> to <S%H3427>live<s%> in; and their <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands<s%> shall be for their <S%H929>cattle<s%> and for their <S%H7399>herds<s%> and for <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H9130>beasts.<s%>

"And the <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands<s%> of the <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> to the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> [shall extend] from the <S%H7023>wall<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H2351>outward<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H5439>around.<s%>

"You shall also <S%H4058>measure<s%> <S%H4480>outside<s%> <S%H2351><s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> on the <S%H9506>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> two <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and on the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> two <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and on the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> two <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and on the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> two <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> with the <S%H5892>city<s%> in the <S%H8432>center.<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> shall <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H1992>theirs<s%> as <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands<s%> for the <S%H5892>cities.<s%>

"And the <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> to the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> [shall be] the <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H4733>refuge,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> for the <S%H7523>manslayer<s%> to <S%H5127>flee<s%> to; and in <S%H5921>addition<s%> to them you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> forty-two <S%H5892>cities.<s%>

<S%H3605>"All<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> to the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> [shall be] forty-eight <S%H5892>cities,<s%> together with their <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands.<s%>

"As for the <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> from the <S%H272>possession<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> you shall <S%H7235>take<s%> <S%H7235>more<s%> from the <S%H7227>larger<s%> and you shall <S%H4591>take<s%> <S%H4591>less<s%> from the <S%H4592>smaller;<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> shall <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H4480>some<s%> of his <S%H5892>cities<s%> to the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> in <S%H6310>proportion<s%> to his <S%H5159>possession<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H5157>inherits.<s%>"
Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H3588>'When<s%> you <S%H5674>cross<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%>

then you shall <S%H7136>select<s%> for yourselves <S%H5892>cities<s%> to be your <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H4733>refuge,<s%> that the <S%H7523>manslayer<s%> who has <S%H5221>killed<s%> any <S%H5315>person<s%> <S%H7684>unintentionally<s%> may <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>

'And the <S%H5892>cities<s%> shall be to you as a <S%H4733>refuge<s%> from the <S%H1350>avenger,<s%> so that the <S%H7523>manslayer<s%> may not <S%H4191>die<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> he <S%H5975>stands<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> for <S%H4941>trial.<s%>
'And the <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you are to <S%H5414>give<s%> shall be your <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H4733>refuge.<s%>

'You shall <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H4480>across<s%> <S%H5676><s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan;<s%> they are to be <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H4733>refuge.<s%>

<S%H428>'These<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> shall be for <S%H4733>refuge<s%> for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and for the <S%H1616>alien<s%> and for the <S%H8453>sojourner<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> them; that <S%H3605>anyone<s%> who <S%H5221>kills<s%> a <S%H5315>person<s%> <S%H7684>unintentionally<s%> may <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>

'But <S%H518>if<s%> he <S%H5221>struck<s%> him <S%H5221>down<s%> with an <S%H1270>iron<s%> <S%H3627>object,<s%> so that he <S%H4191>died,<s%> he is a <S%H7523>murderer;<s%> the <S%H7523>murderer<s%> shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be <S%H4191>put<s%> to <S%H4191>death.<s%>

'And <S%H518>if<s%> he <S%H5221>struck<s%> him <S%H5221>down<s%> with a <S%H68>stone<s%> in the <S%H3027>hand,<s%> by <S%H834>which<s%> he may <S%H4191>die,<s%> and [as a result] he <S%H4191>died,<s%> he is a <S%H7523>murderer;<s%> the <S%H7523>murderer<s%> shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be <S%H4191>put<s%> to <S%H4191>death.<s%>

<S%H176>'Or<s%> if he <S%H5221>struck<s%> him with a <S%H6086>wooden<s%> <S%H3627>object<s%> in the <S%H3027>hand,<s%> by <S%H834>which<s%> he may <S%H4191>die,<s%> and [as a result] he <S%H4191>died,<s%> he is a <S%H7523>murderer;<s%> the <S%H7523>murderer<s%> shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be <S%H4191>put<s%> to <S%H4191>death.<s%>

'The <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H1350>avenger<s%> <S%H1931>himself<s%> shall <S%H4191>put<s%> the <S%H7523>murderer<s%> to <S%H4191>death;<s%> he shall <S%H4191>put<s%> him to <S%H4191>death<s%> when he <S%H6293>meets<s%> him.

'And <S%H518>if<s%> he <S%H1920>pushed<s%> him of <S%H8135>hatred,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H7993>threw<s%> something at him <S%H6660>lying<s%> in <S%H6660>wait<s%> and [as a result] he <S%H4191>died,<s%>

<S%H176>or<s%> if he <S%H5221>struck<s%> him <S%H5221>down<s%> with his <S%H3027>hand<s%> in <S%H342>enmity,<s%> and [as a result] he <S%H4191>died,<s%> the one who <S%H5221>struck<s%> him shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be <S%H4191>put<s%> to <S%H4191>death,<s%> he is a <S%H7523>murderer;<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H1350>avenger<s%> shall <S%H4191>put<s%> the <S%H7523>murderer<s%> to <S%H4191>death<s%> when he <S%H6293>meets<s%> him.

'But <S%H518>if<s%> he <S%H1920>pushed<s%> him <S%H6621>suddenly<s%> <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H342>enmity,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H7993>threw<s%> <S%H3605>something<s%> <S%H3627><s%> at him <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H6660>lying<s%> in <S%H6660>wait,<s%>

<S%H176>or<s%> with <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H834>deadly<s%> <S%H4191><s%> object of <S%H68>stone,<s%> and <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H7200>seeing<s%> it <S%H5307>dropped<s%> on him so that he <S%H4191>died,<s%> while he was not his <S%H340>enemy<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H1245>seeking<s%> his <S%H9567>injury,<s%>

then the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> shall <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H5221>slayer<s%> and the <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H1350>avenger<s%> <S%H5921>according<s%> to <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H4941>ordinances.<s%>

'And the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> shall <S%H5337>deliver<s%> the <S%H7523>manslayer<s%> from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H1350>avenger,<s%> and the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> shall <S%H7725>restore<s%> him to his <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H4733>refuge<s%> to <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H5127>fled;<s%> and he shall <S%H3427>live<s%> in it <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H4194>death<s%> of the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> was <S%H4886>anointed<s%> with the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8081>oil.<s%>

'But <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H7523>manslayer<s%> shall at <S%H3318>any<s%> <S%H3318>time<s%> <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>beyond<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> of his <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H4733>refuge<s%> to <S%H834>which<s%> he may <S%H5127>flee,<s%>

and the <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H1350>avenger<s%> <S%H4672>finds<s%> him <S%H4480>outside<s%> <S%H2351><s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> of his <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H4733>refuge,<s%> and the <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H1350>avenger<s%> <S%H7523>kills<s%> the <S%H7523>manslayer,<s%> he shall not be guilty of <S%H1818>blood<s%>

<S%H3588>because<s%> he should have <S%H3427>remained<s%> in his <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H4733>refuge<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H4194>death<s%> of the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest.<s%> But <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H4194>death<s%> of the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> the <S%H7523>manslayer<s%> shall <S%H7725>return<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of his <S%H272>possession.<s%>
'And <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H428>things<s%> shall be for a <S%H2708>statutory<s%> <S%H4941>ordinance<s%> to you throughout your <S%H1755>generations<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H4186>dwellings.<s%>

'If <S%H3605>anyone<s%> <S%H5221>kills<s%> a <S%H5315>person,<s%> the <S%H7523>murderer<s%> shall be <S%H7523>put<s%> to <S%H7523>death<s%> at the <S%H6310>evidence<s%> of <S%H5707>witnesses,<s%> but <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5315>person<s%> shall be <S%H4191>put<s%> to <S%H4191>death<s%> on the <S%H6030>testimony<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H5707>witness.<s%>

'Moreover, you shall not <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H3724>ransom<s%> for the <S%H5315>life<s%> of a <S%H7523>murderer<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> is <S%H7563>guilty<s%> of <S%H4191>death,<s%> but he shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be <S%H4191>put<s%> to <S%H4191>death.<s%>

'And you shall not <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H3724>ransom<s%> for him who has <S%H5127>fled<s%> to his <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H4733>refuge,<s%> that he may <S%H7725>return<s%> to <S%H3427>live<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H5704>before<s%> the <S%H4194>death<s%> of the <S%H3548>priest.<s%>

'So you shall not <S%H2610>pollute<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> in <S%H834>which<s%> you are; for <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H2610>pollutes<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> and <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3722>expiation<s%> can be <S%H3722>made<s%> for the <S%H776>land<s%> for the <S%H1818>blood<s%> that is <S%H8210>shed<s%> on it, <S%H3588>except<s%> <S%H518><s%> by the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of him who <S%H8210>shed<s%> it.

'And you shall not <S%H2930>defile<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> in <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H3427>live,<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H7931>dwell;<s%> for I the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> am <S%H7931>dwelling<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>' "
